mapper.select: SELECT n.id,n.keywords,n.author,n.title,n.source,n.abstract,n.content,n.create_time,n.publish_time,n.update_time, nt.type_id ,nt.type_name,u.user_id,u.username FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_type nt ON n.news_type=nt.type_id LEFT JOIN users u ON n.user_id=u.user_id where n.title is not null and n.check_status=1 ORDER BY n.create_time desc ,n.update_time limit 0, 7

SELECT n.id,n.keywords,n.author,n.title,n.source,n.content,n.abstract,n.create_time,n.publish_time,n.update_time, nt.type_id ,nt.type_name,u.user_id,u.username FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_type nt ON n.news_type=nt.type_id LEFT JOIN users u ON n.user_id=u.user_id WHERE n.id=#{newsId}

SELECT n.id,n.keywords,n.author,n.title,n.source,n.abstract,n.content,n.create_time,n.publish_time,n.update_time, nt.type_id ,nt.type_name,u.user_id,u.username FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_type nt ON n.news_type=nt.type_id LEFT JOIN users u ON n.user_id=u.user_id where n.title is not null and n.check_status=1 ORDER BY n.create_time desc ,n.update_time limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_type nt ON n.news_type=nt.type_id LEFT JOIN users u ON n.user_id=u.user_id where n.title is not null and n.check_status=1 ORDER BY n.create_time desc ,n.update_time

SELECT n.id,n.keywords,n.author,n.title,n.source,n.abstract,n.content,n.create_time,n.publish_time,n.update_time, n.small_img_url,nt.type_id ,nt.type_name,u.user_id,u.username FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_type nt ON n.news_type=nt.type_id LEFT JOIN users u ON n.user_id=u.user_id WHERE n.small_img_url IS NOT NULL and n.check_status=1 ORDER BY n.create_time DESC ,n.update_time;
